weekly_summary.activity_summary: String predicate functions proposed, debugger improvements opened, type system enhancements progressing, package management refined, Melange pending
weekly_summary.activity:
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Extended String module predicate functions** proposed by [Daniel Bünzli](https://github.com/dbuenzli) with `String.{take,drop,cut}_{first,last}_while` to complement the merged splitting functions [ocaml/ocaml#14362](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14362)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Debugger usability enhancements** opened by [Joel Reymont](https://github.com/joelreymont) including command history and line editing support for ocamldebug [ocaml/ocaml#14353](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14353)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Opam system compiler capabilities** expanded with PRs by [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27) enabling trunk compiler installation [ocaml/ocaml#14354](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14354) and branch pinning [ocaml/ocaml#14355](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14355)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Type system improvements** advancing with spellchecking hints for module errors by [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) [ocaml/ocaml#14330](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14330), atomic class cache access by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) [ocaml/ocaml#14333](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14333), and polymorphic let constraint handling by [Alistair](https://github.com/johnyob) [ocaml/ocaml#14325](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14325)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Runtime fixes** progressing with ephemeron marking improvements by [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) [ocaml/ocaml#14338](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14338) and backup thread synchronization by [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) [ocaml/ocaml#14303](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14303)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Platform integration** work continues with Haiku native backend activation by [Anarchos](https://github.com/Sylvain78) [ocaml/ocaml#14138](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14138) and typing recovery from Merlin by [Xavier Van de Woestyne](https://github.com/xvw) [ocaml/ocaml#14241](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14241)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Type system advancement** in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) with unboxed module elements allowing non-value fields by [James Rayman](https://github.com/jra4) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4020](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4020), `Tof_jkind` for unboxed existentials by [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4995](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4995), pointerness as scannable axis by [Zack Eisbach](https://github.com/zackbach) [oxcaml/oxcaml#5006](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5006), and jkind normalization fuel increase to 10 with linear caching [oxcaml/oxcaml#5009](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5009)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Metaprogramming infrastructure** development in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) through runtime metaprogramming extension by [Andrej Ivašković](https://github.com/Dreian) [oxcaml/oxcaml#5012](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5012) and metaprogramming review by [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4981](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4981)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Backend optimizations** in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) including x86 peephole optimization for dead register moves by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4985](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4985), debug info ordering fix between `Name_for_debugger` and stack spilling by [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) [oxcaml/oxcaml#5013](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5013), and major GC marking loop optimization by [Nick Barnes](https://github.com/NickBarnes) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4997](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4997)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Probes implementation** advancing in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) with unoptimized probes by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4991](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4991) and [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) [oxcaml/oxcaml#5007](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5007), probes refactoring [oxcaml/oxcaml#5011](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5011), and compile-time arch constants [oxcaml/oxcaml#4972](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4972)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Debugging tooling** expansion in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) through LLDB OxCaml language plugin by [Simon Spies](https://github.com/spiessimon) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4961](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4961), function sections with DWARF support [oxcaml/oxcaml#4934](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4934), and reversible name mangling scheme by [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4850](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4850)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Metrics and CI improvements** in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) with per-artifact size tracking by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) [oxcaml/oxcaml#5003](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5003), profile collection alongside artifact sizes [oxcaml/oxcaml#5004](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5004), and `-dump-dir` race condition fix [oxcaml/oxcaml#5010](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5010)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Modes system refinement** in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) with crossing parsing support by [Zack Eisbach](https://github.com/zackbach) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4781](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4781), limited `mod contended` inference [oxcaml/oxcaml#4929](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4929), and arrays of GC-ignorable values by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) [oxcaml/oxcaml#4963](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4963)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Upstream coordination** in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) with downstream of [ocaml/ocaml#13866](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13866) for `occur_rec` optimization by [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) [oxcaml/oxcaml#5015](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5015), collaborating with upstream fix from [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Package management refinements** in [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) including lock directory assumptions fix [ocaml/dune#12712](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12712), solver environment consistency for autolock [ocaml/dune#12719](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12719), opam version reporting [ocaml/dune#12721](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12721), SSH URL support [ocaml/dune#12701](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12701), and chrome tracing stat events [ocaml/dune#12724](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12724) by [Ali Caglayan](https://github.com/Alizter) and [Stephen Sherratt](https://github.com/gridbugs)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **RPC and watch mode fixes** in [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) by [Ambre Austen Suhamy](https://github.com/ElectreAAS) addressing promotion handling issues [ocaml/dune#12604](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12604) fixing [ocaml/dune#12578](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12578) and [ocaml/dune#12577](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12577), eager watch mode promotion registration [ocaml/dune#12726](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12726) reproducing [ocaml/dune#12725](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12725), and non-deterministic hanging [ocaml/dune#12715](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12715)

weekly_summary.cross_repository_work:
- **Merlin integration** coordinated between __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) and [oxcaml/merlin](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin) through .cms file installation alongside .cmt files for debug information [oxcaml/oxcaml#5005](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5005), enabling better IDE tooling support
- **Parameterized libraries** support improved in both __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) with unboxed module elements [oxcaml/oxcaml#4020](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4020) and [oxcaml/merlin](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin) with crash prevention fixes [oxcaml/merlin#196](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/196)
- **Upstream OCaml collaboration** on __RUMINANT:core__ [ocaml/ocaml#13866](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13866) with [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) providing the upstream `occur_rec` optimization that [Liam Stevenson](https://github.com/liam923) is downstreaming to __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) [oxcaml/oxcaml#5015](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/5015)

- **Revdep testing fallout** from __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ OPAM 2.5.0~beta1 requiring odoc-driver upper bound fix by [Anil Madhavapeddy](https://github.com/avsm) [ocaml/opam-repository#28890](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28890)
- **Parameterized libraries support** coordination between __RUMINANT:tools__ [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) and [ocaml/odoc](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc) with [Shon Feder](https://github.com/shonfeder) opening planning issue [ocaml/odoc#1390](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1390) for odoc to represent parameterized libraries, following Dune's extension to support parametric libraries via the oxcaml compiler, based on evaluation documented in [ocaml/dune#12565](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12565)
- **Package management ecosystem alignment** with __RUMINANT:tools__ [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) and [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) both advancing package management capabilities, with Dune's portable lockdirs [ocaml/dune#12680](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12680) and autolocking [ocaml/dune#12653](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12653) complementing opam 2.5.0~beta1 release stabilization
